headline: Gillian Anderson Uncovers Hidden Gems
abstract: The London-based actress finds time for cultural enrichment between starring in “Sex Education” and “The Crown.”
lead_paragraph: When she was cast as a sex therapist raising a teenage son in the Netflix comedy “Sex Education” (which debuts its second season on Friday), Gillian Anderson didn’t need to do much research. “I’m a mom of three kids, I’ve been in therapy since I was 14 and I have sex,” said Anderson. “I spent more time working on the balance of her as an appropriate professional and an inappropriate parent.”
